name: CHESAPEAKE BAY FOUNDATION
description: Conservation and education on Chesapeake Bay.
sampleDescriptions: Funding and authorization for EPA bay program, oyster reef restoration, conservation funding under Farm Bill; conservation programs related to Chesapeake Bay.
